H0.text: Coral reefs that slowly changed size provide the best evidence that Earth has evolved over geologic time.

H1.text: Desert sand dunes that were shaped by winds provide the best evidence that Earth has evolved over geologic time.

H2.text: Deposits of sediment found at the mouth of a river provide the best evidence that Earth has evolved over geologic time.

H3.text: Rock containing fossilized seashells found on a mountaintop provides the best evidence that Earth has evolved over geologic time.

A5.text: Coral, for example, only lives in warm and shallow marine environments and fossils of coral are thus typical for shallow marine facies.
